name: UITextDropEditability
desc: The text-drop editability styles for noneditable text views.

items.name: case no
items.desc: A text-drop editability specifier indicating that a noneditable text view does not accept drops.

items.name: case temporary
items.desc: A text-drop editability specifier indicating that a noneditable text view does accept drops but reverts to its noneditable status immediately afterward.

items.name: case yes
items.desc: A text-drop editability specifier indicating that a noneditable text view does accept drops, and that the dropped text remains editable after the drop is finished.
